Author: herbymoney
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] Herby - Blockchain-based platform for the legal marijuana market
Body: Herby - Blockchain-based platform for the legal marijuana market  Official website | Whitepaper  Facebook | Telegram | Twitter | Instagram | YouTube | Medium | Bounty  BOUNTY Thread - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2394254  WHAT IS HERBY?  Herby is a blockchain platform for creating an associated network of cooperators in the legal marijuana market, united by a single quality brand. We unite the companies participating at all stages: growing, processing, and sale of the goods from natural hemp by introduction of technology of the blockchain.  We promote the entry of new players into the market and strive to create a well-developed business infrastructure in a society free from restrictions related to the use of marijuana.   HERBY'S MISSION  Creation and development of a single blockchain ecosystem for the legal marijuana market.  Provision of financial, consulting and legal support to new participants in the marijuana industry by buying shares of these companies  Creation and development of own payment system for suppliers and buyers of products based on the HBY token "HERBY CARD"  Creation and promotion of the Herby quality label by introducing advanced certification system  MARKET ADVANTAGES  In 2016, residents of the United States and Canada spent 53.3 billion dollars to buy marijuana, including legal purchases for medical purposes. According to ArcView Market Research, this is more than the North Americans spent during the year in fast food restaurants McDonald's and Starbucks.  We can say with confidence that the market of legal marijuana is still in its infancy and has a huge potential for development.  STABILITY OF HBY TOKEN  By investing in production companies, we will be able to maintain a minimum equivalent token value at all points of the Herby network  If the value of the token on the exchange decreases, this will increase the additional demand and will contribute to the stability of the token.  ITO DETAILS  PRE ITO Soft cap: 400 ETH PRE ITO Hard cap: 2 000 ETH ITO Soft cap: 14 000 ETH Target on Crowdsale: 70 000 ETH Token price: 1HBY = 0.001ETH Token Type: ERC20  BONUSES  PRE-ITO WHITELIST: 50% Get on the whitelist PRE-ITO: 40% Nov 21, 2017 - Dec 3, 2017 ITO WHITELIST: 30% ITO 1-ST WEEK: 25% ITO 2-ND WEEK: 20% ITO 3-RD WEEK: 10% ITO 4-TH WEEK: 5%
